title: Wicked Love
description: Has the real enemy been standing right beside me?One of the men I've fallen for may be entwined in my father's murder. The other three are determined to bring him to justice. I stand in the middle, unsure of what to believe.If I accept Beckett's denials and hold on to the trust he earned before, I could be letting a horrible criminal walk free.But if I push him away and he's telling the truth, then we're all in the sights of a vicious organization larger than the rest of us could have imagined. Villains determined to take down not just our investigation but law and order across this city.And I'm the one they'll be gunning for first.
author: Eva Chance
